newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: Philippines, Bahrain sign economic agreement.
newsitem.headline: Philippines, Bahrain sign economic agreement.

text.p: The Gulf Arab state of Bahrain and the Philippines have signed an economic, trade and labour cooperation agreement, the official Gulf News Agency said on Tuesday.
It said the memorandum of understanding signed late on Monday was aimed at boosting cooperation in the fields of trade, investment, industry and labour.
Philippines President Fidel Ramos is currently visiting Bahrain for talks with senior officials.
He is urging Gulf Arab states to pump capital into his country's oil industry and economy.
Ramos arrived in Manama from Qatar on Monday.
